subject: Guidelines and delegation of power for implementation of Green Highways Projects (Plantation; Transplantation; Beautification and Maintenance)
text: #RT 77y UTRf `farrut 77 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (s& qRa07 & totAtTf Katat) Fax : 91-11-25033507 "25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 g, 6, dacr-10, EQT, # fari-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarke_ Delhi-110075 NHAIIPolicy Guidelines/Guidelines and Delegation of Power for Implementation of Green Highways Projects/2017 No.1.1.24/2017 , Dated the December, 2017 (Decision taken by Executive Committee in the meeting held on 28.11.2017 & 29.11.2017 on Agenda Item No.326.14) Sub: Guidelines and delegation of power for implementation of Green Highways Projects (Plantation; Transplantation; Beautification and Maintenance) In light of the instructions of MoRTH regarding Green Highways 2015 released vide OMs dated 28.10.2016 and19.09.2017,and subsequent decision taken in 326th EC meeting following guidelines are hereby circulated to ensure' effective implementation of GHPs; 1 Advisor GHD shall act &s Head: GHD and report to Member Admin: 2. GHD shall empanel and award Green  Highways Projects to competent Agencies (Private NGO Govt ) based on Quality Based  Selection Model: Detailed QBS methodology_is enclosed at Annexure 3 GHPs can be awarded to State Govt  Agencies (i.e Forest Department; FDC and other such agencies) on the basis of their proposal For empanelment of agencies and award of projects, a committee comprising following officers is hereby constituted: Dr. AK Bhattacharya; Head: GHD Chairman Dr. Satish K Tyagi; Joint Adviser GHD Member GM (Environment & GHD) Member Secretary GM Finance Member Mr: Anuj Sharma Member *One GM (Finance) will be appointed to the committee as per approval of Competent Authority. 5. Project  cost  estimates   shall be prepared based on MoRD SOR norms for roadside plantation and maintenance released vide MoRD no 11017/17/2008- NREGA dated 14.07.2014, 6. Payment schedule for the agencies (Govt. Private) shall be based on phase wise   project   deliverables. Payment   schedule for Govt.  Agencies has been approved vide NHAI order dated 19.07.2017. Further, payment schedule for private agencies has been approved vide 316th EC meeting  New 18th Policy
